TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ToolZoneDesigner extends System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.WebZoneDesigner

Docs.summary: Provides design-time support in a visual designer for a Web Parts zone.

remarks.format:
## Remarks In a visual designer, when you switch from Source to Design view, the markup source code that describes the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ToolZone> control is parsed and a design-time version of the control is created on the design surface. When you switch back to Source view, the design-time control is persisted to the markup source code and edited into the markup for the Web page.
The properties of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.ToolZoneDesigner> class provide the following functionality:
- The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.ToolZoneDesigner.ActionLists%2A> property returns a <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection> object, which typically contains all the items in a smart tag panel.
- The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.ToolZoneDesigner.ViewInBrowseMode%2A> property indicates whether the zone is displayed when the user is in browse mode.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
Gets the action list collection for the zone designer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.ToolZoneDesigner.ActionLists%2A> property contains a <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection> collection that represents the aggregation of all the items in a smart tag panel. The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection> class contains zero or more <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList> objects. Each of these lists contains zero or more objects that represent the actual items in the panel and are derived from the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionItem> class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void Initialize(class System.ComponentModel.IComponent component) cil managed

Docs.summary: Prepares the designer to view, edit, and design the Web Parts zone.
Gets or sets a value indicating whether the Web Parts zone is displayed when the user is in the browse display mode.
Docs.value: if the Web Parts zone is displayed when the user is in the browse display mode; otherwise, .
